seo.whatIsContent: **AI Image Editing** uses **Gemini 2.5 Flash Image** (Nano Banana) to modify images with simple text instructions. Change backgrounds, add objects, adjust colors, and apply effects using natural language commands.
seo.howToTitle: How to edit images with AI?
howToSteps: Get a **paid API key** from [Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey)
Upload the **image** you want to edit
Click **'Edit Image'** and download the result (~$0.0125 per edit)
seo.useCasesTitle: Use cases for AI image editing

faq.question: Is this tool free?
faq.answer: No, it requires a **paid Google AI API key**. Cost is approximately **$0.0125 per image edit**. The API key is stored locally in your browser.

faq.question: What is Nano Banana?
faq.answer: **Nano Banana** is the codename for Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, Google's AI model for image generation and editing with text instructions.

faq.question: Does it add watermarks?
faq.answer: Yes, edited images include an **invisible SynthID watermark** for AI-generated content identification, but it's not visible to the human eye.
